1.content:
You sighed as you finished unpacking the last box of stuff, " finally moved in" you think to yourself as you looked about the single-bedroom one-story home you'd be spending the rest of your college days in. Looking out the window and seeing that it was still light you decide to go check out one of the home's largest selling feature, the large forest on the edge of the backyard. As it was fall however the "forest" was nothing more than empty leave less trees at the moment, the crunch of leaves punctuating each footfall.

Taking a moment to rest you take a seat on a stump when you hear leaves rustle. Quick as a shot you're looking all around, until a woman steps out from behind a tree, this wasn't a strange thing, you knew you'd have neighbors but the fact she was wearing a full-body silver cloak that covered her face, and was clutching a large 3-foot long pulsing rainbow egg kind of set off a few warning bells.

Before you could move she was right in front of you shoving the egg into your arms "protect it with your life" she says before disappearing as you blinked. You were left stunned, speechless, not even registering the large egg in your arms fir a few seconds, finally you break out of your stupor to stare at it. The egg, giving off warmth as you u held it. Considering now was a good time to end your little exploration you hurry home, the woman's words echoing in your head.

You weren't sure why but when you get home you feel compelled to build a little sanctuary for the egg on your bed, so grabbing a large box, and a few blankets you set up a snug little incubation box, placing it on the edge of the bed you go to have dinner. Everything is quite till it gets dark out, then you hear a noise, like an egg cracking. You rush back into the bedroom, large cracks were splitting the egg open and finally in a burst of light the egg opened to reveal....?
1.title: What is in the egg?

13111.content:
An rather fat anthropomorphic white furred colored beagle/bloodhound mix who managed to utter his first words while looking directly at you, if you would my good man feed me some puppy chow.

Upon hearing him speak, you proceed to pour some puppy chow into a bowl for your new arrival, as he waddles towards his bowl and proceeds to eat out of his bowl all the while inflating and growing until he's now ten feet tall.

What happens next?

1313111.content: So, you're a boy. But what is the gender of the anthro horse emerging from the egg?
1313111.title: Male

13131112.content:
Suddenly, the egg lets out a blinding flash, and you hear a splitting sound - it must be hatching! Your Vision clears, and you see a small anthro horse sitting on the floor, in th remains of her egg.

Her hair is a deep brown colour, and obscures most of her body, which is a good thing, as she is completely naked. She has light blue eyes and a black mane, and hooves instead of feet, but she has hands. You guess she is roughly one and a half feet tall, and as you pick up the baby anthro she lets out a quiet whinny and nuzzles your chest, pushing herself further into your warm embrace.

You stroke her back gently and carry her to your bed, where you sit down and place her in your lap. You are about to think of what to do when you hear the voice of the woman who gave you the egg in your mind, saying, "She doesn't need to be fed and she doesn't need to drink, or go to the toilet. Be careful, though, as she will get...big, very fast."

You notice it is rather late, and you decide to go to bed. You hold the anthro close to your chest as you drift off to sleep, and...
13131112.title: Female horse

choices: Now grows whenever she eats or drinks
131311121.content:
A series of gentle tics race along the tiny anthro mare's form, causing a warm, tingling sensation wherever they reach, gradually spreading across her body, and, still pressed against your warm chest underneath the duvet, begins to slowly expand.

In her dreams she imagines herself growing, growing, and growing, able to do whatever she wants, and able to make her father feel as warm as he makes her feel. She holds him gently in her city sized palm, and delicately nuzzles him, the gesture of affection making her feel warm and tingly inside, before she blows up to even larger sizes.

Back in your arms, her growth spurt is coming to a halt. She stopped at exactly three feet tall, double her previous height. However, during her growth spurt she had also become slightly more powerful.

The young anthro...
131311121.title: She grows...

choices: Bella wants to try more food
There is a package at the door for you
1313111212.content:
The young mare buries herself further into your chest as you both sleep, her amusing dream over. You both peacefully sleep, the now larger anthro horse cuddling you in her sleep.

You blearily open your eyes and notice a heavy and warm weight on your chest, which observation reveals to be the anthro horse, who... Doubled in size overnight? She wakes up and flicks her ears slightly before launching herself at your head, wrapping her arms around your neck and nuzzling you dearly, refusing to let go.

When she finally lets go, you put on a dressing gown before giving her a piggyback to the kitchen, which she thoroughly enjoys if her excited neighing is any indication. You place her down on the floor and grab yourself a banana from the cupboard, when you notice the mare's confused stare at the banana. Chuckling, you peel it, before opening her mouth with a hand and placing the banana inside, before closing her mouth again, telling her to chew.

She does so, and swallows, before grabbing the rest of the banana and stuffing it into her mouth, skin and all. You lightly pat her head and scratch behind her ears before you feel a strange tingling coming from her body, and she inflates and grows until she is three feet and four inches tall. Four inches from a banana? Wow.

You pick her up into a hug, which she gleefully returns, before waiting for you to sit down so she can sit on your lap as you eat. Suddenly, a thought enters your mind. "You know, I still haven't given you a name. How about Bella?"

The mare nods her head enthusiastically before laying back against your slightly smaller feeling chest, content in the feelings it brings.

What happens next?
1313111212.title: Now grows whenever she eats or drinks

1313121.content:
Inside the egg was a fluffy little sheep girl!

She still had a bit of the broken egg shell on her face, which you gently removed so you could see her pretty face.

"Um...Hi..." You said nervously "What's your name?"

The Little Sheep only bleated

"You're too little to speak English yet aren't you?" You say sympathetically

The Little Sheep beats again

You take her into her arms and carry her into the kitchen

"I think I'll call you Mary." You say as you can't really think of anything else to call a sheep
1313121.title: Sheep

131312211.content: What's the cow's (or bull's) gender?
131312211.title: Male

1313122111.content:
The light the egg exuded was blinding, Alex had to cover his eyes as it filled the entire bedroom and even after it seemed to fade he had to keep his eyes shut for a few seconds as the spots disappeared from his vision. Finally cracking open his eyes he's able to make out that the egg that had been sitting on his bed is gone, however it didn't simply disappear, it was replaced by something else.

Sitting in front of him was a woman, if he had to guess he'd say she was a little over six feet, looking like she was a little, spoiled although it seemed any extra weight she had settled around her breasts and thighs. The aforementioned orbs sitting high and proud on her chest, each breast perfectly round and about the same size as a small beach ball. Her body while being quite...appealing to him, wasn't the strangest thing about the woman before him, rather her dimensions weren't what was strange. From head to toe she was covered in a soft rustic red-brown coat of fur. On that matter she didn't have toes, she had two large cloven hooves rather than feet. Her head as well was different as it looked like a cross between a human head, and a cows head. Her face looking human, two brown eyes staring at him in the middle of the face, but the bottom half of her face extended a few inches ending in the sort of combined, nose/mouth a cow has as well, as well as two large cow ears sat on either side of her head.

He didn't realize until she gives a small cough but he had been staring at her for a few seconds. Quickly looking away, the wall suddenly becoming more appealing he hear the bed creak slightly as she moved across, nearly jumping as he felt a large wet tongue lick against his cheek before hearing a gentle moo. He froze, painful memories rushing back as he turned to stare at this strange woman.

XXXXXXXXXXXXX (flashback)

Alex stared at his parents as they brought in his birthday present, his brothers and he were only 5 years old, first his parents had decided he needed to move out to this dumb smelly farm and now they were presenting him with a calf as a birthday present. "Her name's Bessie, the three of you will be raising her" his mother says.

"But Mooommmmmmm" the boys whine in unison

"No buts, this is to teach the three of you how to be responsible" she states firmly.

"This is in your best interest boys, your mother and I know what's best for you" his father says backing her up. The three of them sigh, and stare angrily at the calf who stares back at the three of them innocently. Of course it wouldn't go that easily, over the next few months it more or less fell onto their parents shoulders to take care of Bessie as none of them wanted to feed or water the cow, and none of them wished to take care of her....droppings.

This all changed however after nearly a year had passed, Bessie was still technically a calf and Alex had his first crush, her name was Katie Wilson, and she was in his first grade class, of course children being children it didn't quite go as planned when he told her. All she did was take the box of chocolates he offered her and walked away, then for the rest of the day she and her friends tormented him when the teacher wasn't looking. He split away from his brother on the way home, running to the barn in tears, finding the usual haystack at the back of the barn he dived in sobbing, the tears ever flowing.

He just lay there sobbing till he felt a soft weight press on his shoulder, turning around he's greeted with Bessie's face, she gives off a small moo and pushes against him. She forcefully pushes her head between his arms, laying her head down on his lap, her large eyes staring up at him, he tightly hugs her head against his and literally cries himself to sleep. When he wakes up he finds himself pressed against Bessie's stomach, the cow sitting there patiently waiting for him to awaken before gently butting him back into the hay and laying her head down in his lap. He smiled at the calf before him, "thank you Bessie" he whispered before hugging her head.

From that day on the two of them were inseparable. He willingly took on all the duties relating to Bessie, including picking up and disposing of her droppings. This continued for years, the two of them sharing life's ups and downs, he even fought his father when he said that he wanted to breed Bessie, however his father won out on that in the end. Bessie however didn't...take to the pregnancy, Alex slowly watched her weaken, this deterioration culminating one day a year and a half ago. His brother rushed in and all he had to do was look into his eyes to know something was wrong. Rushing into the barn he found Bessie lying against the same haystack from all those years ago. He was a little surprised that the two of them were alone but that was secondary in his mind.

"Be...Bessie" he said slowly approaching her, her head lifted slowly at the sound of his voice. The once shining eyes of his best friend had dulled from their usual bright brown to a much duller one. She gave off a soft moo in greeting; he took her head in his arms and gently hugged it into his chest, enjoying the familiar weight and warmth as she gently butts against him. "Bessie I'm here girl, you'll be alright I promise" he said, he swore he felt her shake her head as he said this, her head raising up to his so she could give his cheek a soft long lick, another soft moo gently escaping her lips before he felt all the life just leave her, her head becoming almost dead weight. She had been struggling to stay just so she could say goodbye, "Bessie" slowly, painstakingly slowly her eyes started to shut. "No, no, stay with me Bessie please," he plead with her but he could see that it was a losing battle. Her eyes opened for a fraction of a second meeting his, her eyes seeming to light up in that familiar fashion before slowly and finally closing, her final breath escaping her lips. Sitting there for a few moments he was too stunned to even do anything, before it hit him all at once. "Bessie" he started to sob burying his face against hers, gently cradling her head against his own even as he felt the heat of her life slowly leave her.

He stayed like that for a solid hour, weeping over his best friend. Finally he stood up and gently started to pull the cow out of the barn and out to an oak tree nearby, grabbing a shovel he started to dig, it took almost 12 hours for him to dig Bessie's grave, he stared at her body and as gently as he could began to lower her body into the hole. He stared down at her form and simply said "goodbye Bessie, I'll always remember you girl" before he started to fill the hole in. He delved into his funds from his job and bought a headstone which should still be sitting under that tree stating for the world to see "Here lies Bessie, best friend and confidant, the world grew a little darker with her passing".

XXXXXXX (flashback over)

He stared at the woman before him as she waits patiently for him to come out of whatever trance he had been in. "Hello Alex, I've missed you" she says.

"Bessie" he cried hugging her as tightly as he could practically burying himself in her chest. "How? What? Why?" he said his eyes never once leaving hers.

"Someone up there didn't think it was fair we were separated, so they let me come back, although I had to wait to make sure you'd never forget me" Bessie replies gently returning the hug.

"Bessie of course I'd never forget you" he replied as he felt her gently start to rub his back.

"I know" she replies softly, "I promise I'll never leave you again" she says.
1313122111.title: Female (cow)

1313311.content: What is the bunny's gender.
1313311.title: Male

choices: Go to bed with her, seeing that it's getting late.
13133112.content:
Suddenly, the egg lets out a light, and you cover your eyes to shield them from the blinding light. Once it fades however, and you turn back to the egg, you see a tiny bunny anthro, roughly 3 inches big.

One glance at its chest, you could easily tell it was a girl. It was pure white, she had hands like human, but paws for feet, all of which were covered in a white coat of fur. She looked at you with her green eyes, her long ears twitching cutely, which dissapear underneath her long white hair.

You walk over to her and pick her up, gently holding her in your hands. She lets out a small smile and snuggles up in your hands, nuzzling a finger. You gently pet her with a thumb as you sit on your couch. As you are left with the bunny and your thought, you hear the voice of the woman who gave you the egg.

"She doesn't need to be fed and she doesn't need to drink, however, she will get big, rather quickly too." You look down at the bunny and wonder what to do with her.
13133112.title: Female

131331121.content:
While it was getting late, you were feeling a bit peckish, so you decided to grab a little snack before bed. You bring the little bunny with you, placing her on the counter top as you rummage for a snack. She stares at your curiously as you find some food. Settling on something small, you pull out a small bag of crackers. As you chew on one, the bunny eyes the food. You knew that she did not need to eat, however, she did look like she wanted to have what you were having.

You broke off a small piece for her and handed it to her. She examined it before eating it herself, which she happily chewed on. Once she's done eating, you pet her some as she smiles gleefully, before she slightly shudders, and suddenly grows three whole inches, putting her at half a foot tall now. So this was how she was going to get bigger. The bunny examines herself before looking back at you, and you suddenly realize that you have yet to give her a name.

"Hey, why don't I name you... Emerald?" She smiled more and nuzzled my hand. Seeing how late it was, I decided now would be a good time to go to bed. Picking up Emerald, I went to bed with her and feel asleep for the night.
131331121.title: Feed her some food anyway.

1313311211.content:
I was sitting on the couch with Emerald, not doing much other than simply watching over her. She peered into the kitchen, now knowing that that is where the food is. I don't know if it was because she wanted to get bigger, or simply because she grew a liking to food now.

"You want some food?" I asked the obvious. She looked at me and excitedly nodded her head. I chuckled, getting up to see what she could eat. Taking a peek into the fridge, I saw some carrots. Knowing that rabbits liked carrots, I grabbed one for her. It wasn't anything too large for her, just about half her height. Heading back, I handed her the piece, and she happily started chewing on it. As she took her first gulp, her feet started shuttering, before stretching to an inch long. She and I looked at her feet in awe, before she smiled and started eating more of the carrot, eyeing her feet.

With each gulp, her furry feet grew a bit larger, finally, after finishing the carrot, her feet had grown enormous, for her size at least. They were both 7 inches longer, bigger than she was tall.
1313311211.title: The next day

1323.content:
The gigantic egg opened its interior for reveal to a small creature of the same size of a little child, but the creature was different of a human how any other creature you know. You notices that the creature are still cover with crack and a strange fluid, making your fist task consisting in find a fabric for clean this baby, sadly how you moved today all your stuff its inside of boxes.
With a few of sadness you take of your favorite shirt and with after of wed it in the bathroom to take care of the strange baby that strange creature leave you in charge. Soon the little thing it’s clean making you notice that it was cover not for fur how you believes at beginning bit instead have a fussy downy feathers making your baby officially a bird.
With that clear you put the hatchling in middle of the living room, quickly you close all the curtains and open a box where in it inside you put your pillows. Fortunately your baby bird was too young for walk or moving for himself, what make you easy build a provisional nest made of pillows.
Now the immediately task it’s know what eat this bird, but for that you have to know it’s species, what will be difficult considering what this was in much aspects similar to a human, fortunately its head was very bird like what give you a brilliant idea.
From one of your pockets you take a photo of his head with your cell phone and with an application made for recognize birds you start a investigate the species of your little hatchling. For your surprise the phone give an answers in a instant reveling to you what this was a…

Choose between this two options

Modern Predator - Eagle, Falcon, Hawk etc

Extinct Predator – Terror Bird, Giant Eagle etc.
1323.title: Cute Terrorific Predator

13521.content: And what gender is the unicorn?
13521.title: Male

135212.content:
You try to shield your eyes from the light and stumble, tripping over backwards. The light quickly fades, and you rub your eyes, your vision returning.

Before you was a tiny anthropomorphic unicorn. She had dark grey fur, a completely black horn, and orange hair flowing from the top of her head and in small tufts around her wrists and ankles that glowed with a bizarre light, making it look like flame. She also had hooves instead of feet.

Before you can gather your thoughts, the unicorn begins to vibrate, and with a sound like stretching and squeaking latex, begins to grow. Her growth spurt is powerful, but stops in a matter of seconds, as she stands up, a little unsteady. She towers over your height of six foot by a full eight inches, beachball sized breasts accidentally pushing into your face, forcing you to take a few steps back before you can actually see her face.

Nickering, she seems to notice the massive size difference between you, and takes a single step forward, the loud boom of her hoof connecting with the floor resounding throughout the room. She kneels to put herself at the same height as you, then stands back up, savouring her height of six foot eight inches.

Suddenly, she hugs you, easily lifting you almost almost a foot off the floor, accidentally pushing your face into one of her gigantic breasts, each of which is far larger than your head. Smiling, she sits down and places you on her lap, as you try to understand the situation.

So, do you want to continue this storyline, or start a new one?
135212.title: Female

1532.content:
(Note: When this(1) is beside something, it means if you look at the bottom of this page, I explain my reasoning of this.)
Major Demon


Eve the Reaper
Age: 75, but looks in her teens.


A surprisingly cheerful person, Eve died as an orphan in World War II. She was reborn a Reaper, a demon who kills people when its their time(1). With silver hair, amber eyes, and a modest body, she will stick out in a crowd. If not, her black cloak will.
Eve wields two(Technically four, if you count her demon magic, and her determination) weapons: Her scythe, which can reap souls and can be used as a weapon, but it cannot harm any humans whose time(to die) isn't then. Her second is her ability to transform into things(Example: People)
But she does have two weaknesses: One is her sweet-tooth; She can be easily bribed into giving you one extra week of living if you offer her a piece of candy(Butterscotch is her favorite!). Her second is her ability to not enter holy ground or touch holy objects unless it is completely necessary.

Due to her line of successful reapings, an jealous reaper shot her with a arrow that causes them to revert to an egg(A rather large one but still,) until someone picks it up.


(1): How can Death possibly kill those all around the world in a few seconds, unless there was a group that did so.


P.S: I wrote a chapter for the original story. Glad to know its back! :)
1532.title: More Demons.

154.title: King/queen's of hell (ex. Lilith)

info.brief_description: Recreation of an old story I made
info.description:
I decided to re-create one of my old interactive, thinking it stupid that I deleted it in the first place.
1. M/m, f/m, m/f are all allowed
2. 1st, 2nd and 3rd person narrative styles can be used
3. There are no set characteristics for the character, you choose, age, sex etc, etc
4. Names can be given even in the second person.
5. No toilet, guru/Kuro, other than that anything goes (don't look this up especially image sites)
6. One well-written paragraph per chapter unless it is a choice chapter.
7. Have fun :)
